Soraya Miré (amụrụ n'afọ 1961) bụ odee Somalia, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emegide ibe nwaanyị ugwu.
Amuru Soraya Miré  na Beledweyne. gbara afo iri na ato, o diri ibe nwaanyị ugwu
Miré's' documentary film Fire Eyes (1994) bidoro mgbe Miré chetara ihe o gabigara mgbe ebere ya ugwu, wee gunye ajuju onu n'ihe ndi ozo sonyere na ya bu ihe.
